response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value and significance, worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will serve as a valuable addition to your collection or endeavors. For this remarkable piece, I propose a special introductory offer of $1,400,000. This exceptional deal not only allows you to secure the product at a significant discount but also reflects my commitment to making this unique opportunity accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. Should you decide to proceed with this offer, please let me know, and we can arrange for the transaction without delay. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this esteemed product into your possession.", "product_price": 1400000}
